skill.name: behaviors.skills.primitives.UndoConfine
skill.description:
To lift the confinement of a population located into a set of given populated area.
When several populated areas should be visited to lift the confinement of the population into, the agent lift the confinement for each area by following the order of the elements into the 'populatedAreas' list.
If the visited area does not contain population, the lift of the confinement is not effective.

parameter.name: populatedAreas
parameter.description: The ordered list of populated areas in which a population is confined.

link.name: reach
link.description: To move to the populated areas.

link.name: undoconfine
link.description: To lift the confinement of the population.

feedback.name: undoConfined
feedback.description: Sent when a population is no more confined into a populated area.

argument.name: populatedArea
argument.description: The populated area in which the population is no more confined.

feedback.name: done
feedback.description: Sent when all "populatedAreas" have been visited. Even if one of them haven't be healed.

feedback.name: failed
feedback.description: Sent if the set of "populatedAreas" is empty (no element to act on).
